org.team751.utils

Class Vec2

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.team751.utils.Vec2

  • public class Vec2
extends Object
    A vector with two elements of type double. All modifying methods return a newly allocated instance, rather than modifying the current one.
    Author:
    Sam Crow

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      protected double x
      The X (horizontal) component
      protected double y
      The Y (vertical) component

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      Vec2() 
      Vec2(double x, double y) 

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      Vec2 add(Vec2 other)
      Create a new vector from the sum of this vector and another
      Object clone()
      Create and return a newly allocated vector with the same values as this one
      static Vec2 fromAngle(double angleDegrees, double magnitude)
      Create a new vector with a given angle (counterclockwise from the positive X axis) and magnitude
      double getAngleDegrees()
      Get the angle of this vector
      double getMagnitude()
      Get the magnitude (hypotenuse length) of this vector
      double getX()
      Get the X component
      double getY()
      Get the Y component
      Vec2 invert()
      Create a new vector with X and Y values that are the negatives of the values in this vector
      Vec2 multiply(double d)
      Create a new vector from the product of this vector and a scalar
